definition: in any case/no matter what
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Guan

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
how
manner/pattern/way/appearance/shape/classifier: kind, type

sentences.english: At the very least, that will make it hard for a future President to keep tax-cut promises.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，下一任總統將很難兌現他們減稅的承諾。

sentences.english: Although I only am the unrequited love, no matter what, I had loved you.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我只是單相思，不管怎樣，曾經我是愛過你的。

sentences.english: Brady said he would reflect on what the future might hold in the coming weeks.
sentences.chinese: 布蘭迪說未來數週以後，不管怎樣，他都會接受結果。

sentences.english: Its a shame you had to go so fast but take care anyway.
sentences.chinese: 真可惜你那麼快又要走了，不管怎樣，一路保重。

sentences.english: Be good anyway. Give the world the best you have anyway.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，總是要將你所擁有的最好的東西獻給世界。

sentences.english: Anyhow, this knowledge has not sunk in for so many people.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，這種觀念並沒有被許多人接受。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is an excellent hay, which can be cut twice.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，這總是一種可以收割兩次的草料。

sentences.english: You really shouldn't watch so much television anyway.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，你真的應少看些電視了。

sentences.english: Practice it, try to be happy no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 多練習幾次，不管怎樣都要試着開心起來。

sentences.english: So long as it was still day, Trufa managed somehow to endure her grief.
sentences.chinese: 只要天還沒黑，特魯法不管怎樣還能設法忍受悲痛。

sentences.english: Anyway, go and ask the Business Centre.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，去到商務中心問問吧。

sentences.english: The preparations for the summit, at any rate, have been unusually contentious.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，這次峯會的籌備工作還是飽受爭議。

sentences.english: Anyway, it was pretty Christmasy all of a sudden.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，剎那間，四周已是一片聖誕景象。

sentences.english: Anyway, kudos to these researchers for studying women.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，這些榮譽給研究女性的研究者們。

sentences.english: Anyway, do you dare to “wear” like them and walking on the street?
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，你敢“穿”得像他們一樣在街頭秀一下嗎？
不管怎樣，你總會長大的。

definition: whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to come to accept an unpleasant fact/to get over sth/to cheer up
sooner or later
to resume/to restart/to start afresh
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]
to believe firmly/without any doubt
at the minimum/at the very least
it doesn't matter
not to have any meaning/meaningless
would rather/better
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
